subject: Returning Order #SSN4281
description_text:
Hello,
I would like to return the items in this order due to discovering they are
incompatible with the sim rig.
All items have original packaging.
The items were received on 10th and the18th december.

If any further information is required please let me know.

Kind regards

Connor Mitchell

conversations.body_text: Hi Connor Mitchell,    Alright, you can return the package to our German warehouse. We will process your refund after receiving and inspecting it. Please ensure the packaging is intact and the product shows no signs of use, otherwise the return request will not be approved. Happy New Year!  Gubitz GmbH(LeiXuan A211) Hüttenkamp 12 Neumünster,Schleswig-Holstein   24536 +49 17622233089

Hello,
Thankyou for your reply. Do I need a return label so it can be identified
by which order it is when it has been delivered?

Kind regards

On Wed, 31 Dec 2025, 8:56 am service@simsonn.com,
Hi Connor Mitchell,     You will need to ship the package yourself and provide us with the tracking number after it has been shipped.
